findings.title: Potential reentrancy in transfer and transferFrom functions
findings.description: The transfer and transferFrom functions are vulnerable to potential reentrancy attacks.

findings.title: Unprotected function approve
findings.description: The approve function does not have any access control or validation, allowing unauthorized users to call it.

findings.title: Unprotected function increaseAllowance
findings.description: The increaseAllowance function is unprotected and can be exploited by malicious actors.

findings.title: Unprotected function decreaseAllowance
findings.description: The decreaseAllowance function is unprotected and can be called by anyone, potentially leading to unauthorized changes.

findings.title: Unprotected function claimMarketing
findings.description: The function claimMarketing is unprotected and can be exploited by an external attacker.

findings.title: Unprotected function claimLottery
findings.description: The claimLottery function lacks protection, potentially allowing unauthorized access or manipulation.

findings.title: Unprotected function claimDevelopment
findings.description: The function claimDevelopment is unprotected and can be exploited by an external attacker.

findings.title: Unprotected function recover
findings.description: The 'recover' function is unprotected and can be exploited by an attacker.

findings.title: Unprotected function setIsFeeExempt
findings.description: The setIsFeeExempt function lacks access control and can be called by anyone, potentially leading to unauthorized changes.

findings.title: Unprotected function setIsMarketMaker
findings.description: The setIsMarketMaker function lacks access control and can be called by anyone.

findings.title: Unprotected function setFees
findings.description: The function setFees is declared as external and lacks access control, allowing anyone to call it.
